title: Entertainment:Trishala Dutt Pens Down Heartbreaking Post for Late Boyfriend, Joker’s IMDb Rating Surpasses That Of The Dark Knight & More From Ent
text:
It has been long that we have been waiting for a reunion of FRIENDS cast, right? But our favourite actors only give us mini-reunion. If you follow them, you would know that Courteney Cox & Lisa Kudrow AKA Monica and Phoebe often hang out with each other.

For the unversed, the makers of Bigg Boss 13 have introduced a new term this time. While earlier, the contestants chose who they will share the bed with on their own, this time they entered the show in couples – as BFFs (Bed Friends Forever). This hasn’t gone down well with many, especially the the Confederation of All India Traders (CAIT).

For their cheat meal, they ordered an enormous Dosa. Amrita Singh was a little embarrassed. So much so, she hide her face from the camera as Sara pokes fun at her and asks “Hi mom we’re live on Instagram. Why are you eating like this today? What’s gone wrong?”

Today, on his birthday, Trishala got emotional yet again. Dedicating a post on Instagram to him, she shared a heart-touching photo of two of them together. In the caption, she wrote, “Not a day, not a second, not a moment goes by where I don’t think about you. Happy Birthday. Rest In Paradise. I love you. Love, Bella Mia.”

While many people are left terrified after watching the movie, the security outside and inside the theatres in the US has been increased. Police fear that Joker could inspire another incident like 2012 Aurora, Colorado theatre shooting, where a gunman called James Holmes killed 12 people at the opening weekend of The Dark Night Rises, a Batman film. Hence, even masks and face paints has been banned at the cinema halls.
